maqras.text: 73|20|Niscaya apanara raba janena ye, apani salate damrana kakhana'o ratera praya du'i-trtiyansa, kakhana'o ardhansa ebam kakhana'o eka-trtiyansa ebam damraya apanara sange yara ache tadera ekati dala'o. Ara allahi nirdharana karena dina o ratera parimana [1]. Tini janena ye, tomara eta puropuri palana karate parabe na [2], ta'i allah tomadera ksama karalena [3]. Kaje'i kura'ana theke yatatuku sahaja tatatuku para, allah janena ye, tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u asustha haye parabe, ara ke'u ke'u allahara anugraha sandhane desa bhramana karabe ebam ke'u ke'u allahara pathe lara'iye lipta habe. Kaje'i tomara kura'ana hate yatatuku sahajasadhya tatatuku para. Ara tomara salata kayema kara, yakata pradana kara [4] ebam allahke da'o uttama rna [5]. Tomara tomadera nijedera jan'ya bhala ya kichu agrima pathabe tomara ta pabe allahara kache [6]. Ta utkrstatara ebam puraskara hisebe mahattara. Ara tomara ksama prarthana kara allahara kache. Niscaya allah ksamasila, parama dayalu.
74|1|He bastraacchadita! [1]
74|2|Uthuna, atahpara satarka karuna [1]
74|3|ara apanara rabera sresthatba ghosana karuna.
74|4|Ara apanara paricchada pabitra karuna [1]
74|5|ara sirka parihara kare caluna [1]
74|6|ara besi pa'oyara pratyasaya dana karabena na [1].
74|7|Ara apanara rabera jan'ye'i dhairya dharana karuna.
74|8|Atahpara yakhana singaya phumka deya habe [1]
74|9|sedina habe eka sankatera dina
74|10|ya kaphiradera jan'ya sahaja naya [1].
74|11|Chere dina amake o yake ami srsti karechi ekaki [1].
74|12|Ara ami take diyechi bipula dhana- sampada [1]
74|13|ebam nityasangi putragana [1]
74|14|ara take diyechi sbacchanda jibanera pracura upakarana
74|15|era para'o se kamana kare ye, ami take ara'o besi de'i [1]
74|16|kakhano naya, se to amadera nidarsanasamuhera birud'dhacari.
74|17|Acire'i ami take carara [1] sasti diye kasta-klanta karaba.
74|18|Se to cinta karala ebam sid'dhanta grahana karala.
74|19|Sutaram dhbansa hoka se! Kemana kare se e sid'dhanta grahana karala
74|20|tarapara'o dhbansa hoka se! Kemana kare se e sid'dhante upanita hala
74|21|tarapara se takala.
74|22|Tarapara se bhrakuncita karala o mukha bikrta karala.
74|23|Tarapara se pichana phirala ebam ahankara karala.
74|24|Atahpara se balala, ‘e to loka paramparaya prapta jadu bhinna ara kichu naya [1]
74|25|e to manusera'i katha.’
74|26|Acire'i ami take dagdha karaba ‘sakara’ e
74|27|ara apanake kise janabe ‘sakara’ ki
74|28|eta abasista rakhabe na ebam chere'o debe na [1].
74|29|Eta to sarirera camara puriye kalo kare debe
74|30|‘sakara’-era tattbabadhane rayeche unisajana prahari.

74|31|Ara amara to jahannamera prahari kebala pheresataderake'i karechi [1]; kaphiradera pariksasbarupa'i amara tadera e sankhya ullekha karechi yate kitabapraptadera drrha pratyaya janme, ara yara imana eneche tadera imana bere yaya. Ara kitabapraptara o muminara sandeha posana na kare. Ara yena era phale yadera antare byadhi ache tara o kaphirara bale, allah e (sankhyara) upama [2] (ullekha kara) dbara ki iccha karechena?’ Ebhabe allah yake icche pathabhrasta karena ebam yake icche hedayata karena. Ara apanara rabera bahini samparke tini chara ke'u jane na. Ara jahannamera e barnana to manusera jan'ya eka upadesa matra.
74|32|Kakhano'i na [1], camdera sapatha
74|33|sapatha ratera, yakhana tara abasana ghate
74|34|sapatha prabhatakalera, yakhana ta alokojjbala haya
74|35|niscaya jahannama bhayabaha bipadasamuhera an'yatama
74|36|manusera jan'ya satarkakarisbarupa
74|37|tomadera madhye ye agrasara hate caya kimba ye pichiye parate caya tara jan'ya [1].
74|38|Pratyeka byakti nija krtakarmera daye abad'dha [1]
74|39|tabe danapanthira naya
74|40|baga-bagicara madhye tara eke aparake jijnesa karabe –
74|41|aparadhidera samparke
74|42|‘Tomaderake kise ‘sakara’- e niksepa kareche?’
74|43|Tara balabe, ‘amara salata adayakaridera antarbhukta chilama na [1]
74|44|ara amara abhabagrastake khadya dana karatama na [1]
74|45|ebam amara anarthaka alapakaridera sathe behuda alape magna thakatama.
74|46|Ara amara pratidana dibase mithyaropa karatama
74|47|abasese amadera kache mrtyu agamana kare [1].’
74|48|Phale suparisakaridera suparisa tadera kono upakara karabe na [1].
74|49|Atahpara tadera ki hayeche ye, tara mukha phiriye neya upadesa hate
74|50|tara yena bhita-trasta haye palayanarata ekapala gadha
74|51|yara sinhera bhaye palayana kareche [1].
74|52|Baram tadera madhyakara pratyeke'i kamana kare ye, take ekati unmukta grantha deya hoka [1].
74|53|Kakhano naya [1]; baram tara akheratake bhaya kare na [2].
74|54|Niscaya e kura'ana to sakalera jan'ya upadesabani [1].
74|55|Ata'eba yara icche se ta theke upadesa grahana karuka.
74|56|Ara allahara icche chara ke'u upadesa grahana karate pare na; tini'i yogya ye, ekamatra tamra'i taka'oya abalambana kara habe, ara tini'i ksama karara adhikari [1].
